ygData.subject: Re: Onyx in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: How much you sellin the jade for? i made a topaz necklace +4vs disease and no one want s to buy even 1 plat from cost. Jade is only +5 mana does that mean
ygData.messageBody:
How much you sellin the jade for?
i made a topaz necklace +4vs disease and no one want's
to buy even 1 plat from cost.
Jade is only +5 mana does that mean points? because
that's not that much.
I would rather have a ring that gives +10 mana eahc
ring
The Wanderer
--- Brewhaus <brewhaus@...> wrote:
> From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>
>
>
> I have seen this too. When I first put points into
> jewelcraft I only
> had 18 points. I bought some siver and malchite and
> successfully made a
> ring. So i bought some silver and Rose Quartz and
> successfully made a
> ring. Than I tried Jasper and failed. So i went
> back to malchite and it
> said this item is trivial to make, but i failed
> again. So i tried Jasper
> again and failed. And this whole time I didn't gain
> any experience.
>
> >
> > i know, thats what is weird!!!! i am making good
> money though selling
> those
> > +5 mana rings :)
> > but i dont understand how i rarely fail???? so,
> should i just keep making
> > rings with jade for now?? until it says its too
> easy for me??? i dont
> > understand, cause everything so far posted on this
> list, says that i
> should
> > not even be able to make the rings :/
> >
> > -Aeramus [ELITE]
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 6:38 PM
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Onyx in Freeport
> >
> >
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > >
> > > Are you kidding? I have skill 36 so jade is the
> next stone for me. I
> > > have failed in both attempts. So that's 0%
> success rate and I SHOULD
> > > be succeeding. So your 80% seems a little
> rediculous.
> > >
> > > Q d'E
> > >
> > > --- Daniel Devorkin <devo@...> wrote:
> > > > From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
> > > >
> > > > do you have do go through all the stones??? i
> have

> > > > is this normal???
> > > >
> > > >
